publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3317 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerkâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, between 1 September 2009 and 31 August 2010, the Office of the Clerk will be open on all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 27 November 2009, 24 December (pm), 25 and 28 December 2009, 1 and 4 January 2010, 2 and 5 April 2010 and 3, 28 and 31 May 2010.
